name: Spooky Mansion (itch) (Box Heads)
description:
Description

Spooky Mansion is a simple 1v1 game (2 players only) where one player is a janitor and the other one is a ghost. Janitor's task is to fix all the broken stuff and make the house look clean and pretty while the ghost is trying to scare him.

Controls

Xbox controller recommended. Also works with a  keyboard.
